notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.); item judged post-1700 by Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).

Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
Bound with: The lawfulness and the right manner of keeping Christmass and other festivals. 2nd ed. London: H.Hills, 1707.
